input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5' Hinged with Snow, Red Berries, Cones, and 750'
  - Name='Topbuy 6FT Life-Like Slender White Christmas Tree Artificial Pencil Unlit Xmas Tree W/ Folding Metal Stand & Durable PVC'
  - Name='Christmas Time 6.5 ft. Windsor Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Charlton Home Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Hello Honey Stoneware Christmas Trees'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 2' Heritage Pine Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Multi-Colored LED Lights'
  - Name='8 ft. Green Unlit Hinged Artificial Christmas Spruce Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7.5' Colorado Mountain Fir "Natural Look" Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear LED Lights and 3048 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Northern Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Perfect Holiday Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 650 Clear Lights and 2598 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Hyleory 6ft Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7 ft Unlit Plastic Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Hyleory 7.5ft Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='DOMETOUR 9' Tall Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Topbuy 6FT Life-Like Slender White Christmas Tree Artificial Pencil Unlit Xmas Tree W/ Folding Metal Stand & Durable PVC
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and unlit artificial tree with a folding metal stand, but slimmer pencil shape and different construction materials (PVC), less full-bodied branch design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time 6.5 ft. Windsor Pine Slim Artificial Christmas Tree LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar sized artificial pine tree with LED lights but slimmer silhouette and different species (Windsor Pine), not a fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Balsam Fir which is very similar to Dunhill Fir, narrow shape but high quality artificial tree, likely similar construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (White Spruce), but similar realistic artificial tree with flip branches, thus similar assembly style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit fir tree with slim silhouette and artificial construction, slightly different form factor but same general product category.
Stoneware decorative trees are not artificial pine/fir trees and serve a completely different purpose and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree with flip branches similar to hinged set-up; high quality and similar purpose to the Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 2' Heritage Pine Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Multi-Colored LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller 2 feet height and pine species with pre-lit colored lights, less similar in size and species to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 8 ft. Green Unlit Hinged Artificial Christmas Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar hinged branch construction and unlit artificial spruce tree, larger in height but similar purpose and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce tree likely similar construction and appearance to fir trees, slightly different species but comparable product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7.5' Colorado Mountain Fir "Natural Look" Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 Clear LED Lights and 3048 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar fir tree species, pre-lit with clear lights, large realistic branch count, bendable branches allowing shaping similar to hinged branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Northern Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height pine tree with artificial construction but different species and possibly different branch construction style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fraser Fir species similar to Dunhill Fir, artificial Christmas tree with comparable likely construction and look.
Generic artificial Christmas tree without specific details on species or construction, offering moderate relevance by default.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 650 Clear Lights and 2598 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species, pre-lit with clear lights, high branch count and realistic styling, closely matching reference features.
Similar height unlit tree but no species or construction details, likely less full-bodied or hinged; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7 ft Unlit Plastic Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit plastic tree with no specifics on species or construction style, and taller height with likely less realistic look.
Unlit artificial tree similar in size to some competitors but lacking species or branch construction detail.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: DOMETOUR 9' Tall Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much taller slim artificial tree with snow-flocked feature, different silhouette and likely different branch style.
